_comment: Copy this file to config.json and fill in your Slack IDs

routing_policy._comment_routing: Map HITL gate types to Slack channels

rbac_map._comment_rbac: Map Slack user IDs to roles. Find user ID: click profile > 3-dot menu > Copy member ID

_comment_ideas: Channel IDs for idea capture. Find ID: right-click channel > View details > scroll to bottom
_comment_emoji: Emoji name (without colons) that triggers idea capture when reacted to any message
